Text: Thanks Thumper, first key worked perfectly, +1 from me, Cheers.
great torrent worked perfectly good job thumbs up from me

Something's wrong. It didn't ask me for any key/license number. Also, the features are not the ones of the full software but the ones of a free avg software (which was already installed). Whats step was I supposed to take? Is it important to first uninstall the free avg software from the machine before installing this one? Doesn't it uninstall/reinstall on its own?
Can someone please guide me? Thanks.
install. then click on help. click activate. put in provided serial.click activate. restart.done.

Thanks tr99tr for the instructions.

Also, for the past few days I've been getting an AVG window that says AVG has crashed, and if I want to send a delivery report to AVG. Mostly I click on 'no' but just now I clicked on 'yes'. Could it be that AVG is surreptitiously keeping track of people who are using unlicensed software? In any case, why do I keep getting these error reports? The anti-virus has been running fine all this but now this is happening everyday and I'm wondering if these errors mean anything?

Start up AVG Internet Security
go to TOOLS
FIREWALL SETTINGS ...scroll down for AVG

Not sure which one to block
